name: Cannon Crew: Reloaded
description:
Cannon Crew: Reloaded is currently in a pre-alpha state. This means most of the content in the game is either a test or prototype for the complete game. 

Current features:

- 1 to 4 players local co-op (with Xbox or Windows gamepads) 

- Multiple storyline quests and side quests

- Endless castle defence

- Player upgrade system

- Hire crew members and soldiers to defend your castle with
